channel.title: RuneX - The Next Biggest Server - UPDATES!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]RuneX ~ By Bill[/size] [size=12pt] The Objective of RuneX is to bring together a new type of server. The server content will be very much based around how runescape was in 377 - 400. The only difference will be the economy!
So it is half correct when i say im making a "RuneScape Remake". Difference: Economy and shop positions.
By Economy i mean shops, what players own and how much money they have. I aim to create a "Perfect" economy. The effect of a "Perfect" economy is being afraid to PK. I have played RuneScape since the 194 BETA and RSC
I am going to try and get EVERYTHING to do somthing. If that makes sence :|
[b]Base: Deltacleaned Why? 1 Reason. Yes, i could code on any base i would like, BUT on delta i can code fast. Very fast.[/b] Lets begin:[/size]
Attack: 100% ~ Had allot of work on it by me and now is close to "Perfect" Strength: 100% ~ Had allot of work on it by me and now is close to "Perfect" Defence: 100% ~ Had allot of work on it by me and now is close to "Perfect" The whole combat system has been rewritten by me to produce nice, clean combat. The max hit formulas are as close as can be and the battle timers are as close as possible. NPC's are using another "perfect" system. they NEVER flinch, but still need some work Range: 100% ~ DONE :) All projectiles, all requirements etc. Prayer: 100% ~ Recoded and sexy! Nothing much to say ~ Pretty perfect! Effects also added to the maxhit Magic: 100% ~ Credits to Bakatool :D Runecrafting: 50% ~ Started :D Produces whats required, just need the hand held things... HP: 100% ~ Ties in with rest... Agility: 0% ~ No work yet Herblore: 0% ~ No work yet Thieving: 0% ~ No work yet Crafting: 0% ~ No work yet Fletching: 0% ~ No work yet Slayer: 0% ~ No work yet Mining: 95% ~ NEARLY!!! Smithing: 0% ~ No work yet Fishing: 100% ~ Only a bit left Cooking: 40% ~ Needs work :/ Firemaking: 95% ~ Close to finishing. Woodcutting: 70% ~ Needs more work Farming: 0% ~ No work yet
Minigames: Castle Wars: 90% ~ A bit more work needed There will be more work ~ Just a bit more time needed :| Evidence of work:
Me standing in varrock -,- [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2wc1wut.jpg[/img]
Me and a few mates chilling on the server
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/9la8zt.jpg[/img]
~Bill [size=18pt]UPDATES!
24th April ~ Bill
Wrote a new prayer base making prayer - 100% Rewrote RuneCrafting ~ ALL I NEED ARE THE HAND HELD THINGS - 50% Wrote a load of woodcutting - decided against stumps. Fixed a combat bug! Fixed range - now 100% Nearly finished mining - now 95% Finished fishing - now 100% [/size] [/center]

item.title: RuneX - The Next Biggest Server - UPDATES!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

cows1471:

what is this MINI you speak of?

Mina is a Java Networking API, that utilizes NIO. At the time of winterloves creation, The java IO package was released, however NIO (Non-blocking IO) was not. Basically Mina improves performance, and is more scalable, but only if added correctly, if its added incorrectly, the source could worse than the original.

To find out how to add it, i would look into sources like hyperion and rs377d.

Read full topic
